# addAccessoryController(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified controller of an accessory view to be presented in the page setup panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAccessoryController(_ accessoryController: NSViewController)
```

## Parameters

- **accessoryController**: The controller to add.

## Customizing the page setup dialog

- **removeAccessoryController(_:)**: Removes the specified controller of an accessory view.
- **accessoryControllers**: An array of accessory view controllers belonging to the page layout panel.
